mapper.insert: insert into project_member(name, age, height, weight, gender, leftEye, rightEye, handPhone, password) values(#{name},#{age},#{height},#{weight},#{gender},#{leftEye},#{rightEye},#{handPhone},sha1(#{password}))
mapper.select: select member_no, name, age, gender, handPhone from project_member order by name desc
select member_no, name, age, height, weight, gender, leftEye, rightEye, handPhone, created_date from project_member where member_no=#{no}
select member_no, name, handPhone, gender, created_date from project_member where handPhone=#{handPhone} and password=sha1(#{password})
mapper.update: update project_member set name=#{name}, age=#{age}, height=#{height}, weight=#{weight}, gender=#{gender}, leftEye=#{leftEye}, rightEye=#{rightEye}, handPhone=#{handPhone}, password=sha1(#{password}) where member_no=#{no}
